name: TRELLO__GET_BOARDS
description: Retrieve all Trello boards for project overview and workspace management across teams

filter.description: Filter boards by status or type

fields.description: Fields to include in board response

lists.description: Whether to include lists in response

name: TRELLO__CREATE_BOARD
description: Create new Trello boards for project initialization and team collaboration workspace setup

name.description: Name of the board to create

idOrganization.description: Organization ID to create board under

idBoardSource.description: Board ID to copy structure from

keepFromSource.description: What to copy from source board

powerUps.description: Power-ups to enable on the board

prefs_selfJoin.description: Allow organization members to join board

prefs_background.description: Background color or image for board

name: TRELLO__GET_LISTS
description: Retrieve lists from Trello boards for workflow column management and task organization tracking

board_id.description: Unique identifier of the board to get lists from

fields.description: Fields to include in list response

cards.description: Whether to include cards in response

card_fields.description: Fields to include for cards if included

name: TRELLO__CREATE_LIST
description: Create lists in Trello boards for workflow columns and task categorization organization

name.description: Name of the list to create

idBoard.description: Board ID to create list in

pos.description: Position of list (top, bottom, or number)

name: TRELLO__GET_CARDS
description: Retrieve cards from Trello boards for task management and project progress tracking analysis

board_id.description: Unique identifier of the board to get cards from

fields.description: Fields to include in card response

name: TRELLO__CREATE_CARD
description: Create cards in Trello for task creation and project item tracking with detailed information

name.description: Name of the card to create

idList.description: List ID to create card in

pos.description: Position of card (top, bottom, or number)

due.description: Due date for the card (ISO 8601 format)

idMembers.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to assign

idLabels.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to apply

fileSource.description: File to attach to the card

keepFromSource.description: What to copy from source card

name: TRELLO__UPDATE_CARD
description: Update existing Trello cards for task management, status changes, and assignment modifications

card_id.description: Unique identifier of the card to update

idMembers.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to assign

idAttachmentCover.description: Attachment ID to use as cover

idList.description: List ID to move card to

name: TRELLO__GET_MEMBERS
description: Retrieve board members and collaborators for team management and assignment tracking in Trello

board_id.description: Unique identifier of the board to get members from

fields.description: Fields to include in member response

name: TRELLO__ADD_MEMBER_TO_BOARD
description: Add members to Trello boards for team collaboration and project access management

member_id.description: Member ID to add to board

name: TRELLO__GET_CHECKLISTS
description: Retrieve checklists from Trello cards for task breakdown and completion tracking management

card_id.description: Unique identifier of the card to get checklists from

fields.description: Fields to include in checklist response

checkItem_fields.description: Fields to include for checklist items

name: TRELLO__CREATE_CHECKLIST
description: Create checklists in Trello cards for task breakdown and subtask management organization

idCard.description: Card ID to create checklist in

pos.description: Position of checklist (top, bottom, or number)

name: TRELLO__CREATE_CHECKLIST_ITEM
description: Add items to Trello checklists for detailed task breakdown and progress tracking management

checklist_id.description: Unique identifier of the checklist to add item to

pos.description: Position of item (top, bottom, or number)

name: TRELLO__UPDATE_CHECKLIST_ITEM
description: Update checklist items in Trello for task completion status and progress tracking management

name: TRELLO__GET_LABELS
description: Retrieve labels from Trello boards for task categorization and visual organization management

board_id.description: Unique identifier of the board to get labels from

fields.description: Fields to include in label response

limit.description: Maximum number of labels to return

name: TRELLO__CREATE_LABEL
description: Create labels in Trello boards for task categorization and visual organization systems

name.description: Name of the label to create

idBoard.description: Board ID to create label in

name: TRELLO__ADD_COMMENT
description: Add comments to Trello cards for team communication and task discussion collaboration

card_id.description: Unique identifier of the card to comment on

name: TRELLO__GET_ATTACHMENTS
description: Retrieve attachments from Trello cards for file management and document tracking workflows

card_id.description: Unique identifier of the card to get attachments from

fields.description: Fields to include in attachment response

name: TRELLO__ADD_ATTACHMENT
description: Add attachments to Trello cards for file sharing and document collaboration workflows

card_id.description: Unique identifier of the card to add attachment to

url.description: URL of the file or link to attach

setCover.description: Set this attachment as card cover

name: TRELLO__GET_ACTIONS
description: Retrieve activity history and actions from Trello boards for audit trail and activity monitoring

board_id.description: Unique identifier of the board to get actions from

fields.description: Fields to include in action response

limit.description: Maximum number of actions to return

since.description: Only return actions since this date (ISO 8601)

before.description: Only return actions before this date (ISO 8601)

name: TRELLO__ARCHIVE_CARD
description: Archive Trello cards to remove from active workflow while preserving task history and data

card_id.description: Unique identifier of the card to archive

value.description: Set to true to archive card, false to restore

name: TRELLO__MOVE_CARD
description: Move Trello cards between lists for workflow progression and task status management tracking

card_id.description: Unique identifier of the card to move

value.description: List ID to move card to

name: TRELLO__SEARCH_CARDS
description: Search for cards across Trello boards using queries for task discovery and project management

idBoards.description: Comma-separated board IDs to search in

idOrganizations.description: Comma-separated organization IDs to search in

idCards.description: Comma-separated card IDs to search in

modelTypes.description: Types of objects to search for (boards,cards,organizations,members)

board_fields.description: Board fields to include in results

boards_limit.description: Maximum number of boards to return

card_fields.description: Card fields to include in results

cards_limit.description: Maximum number of cards to return

organizations_limit.description: Maximum number of organizations to return

members_limit.description: Maximum number of members to return

name: TRELLO__GET_ORGANIZATIONS
description: Retrieve organizations and teams from Trello for workspace management and team coordination

fields.description: Fields to include in organization response
